Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class VirtualClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualClient
public class VirtualClient extends Object
Virtual client interface; this is a representation of the virtual instance of the client, which is connected through server socket. It's used for preparing the answer to be sent and for general operations on the client too.
See Also:
  • PropertyChangeListener

  • Constructor Details

    • VirtualClient

      public VirtualClient(int clientID, String nickname, SocketClientConnection socketClientConnection, GameHandler gameHandler)
      Constructor VirtualClient creates a new VirtualClient instance.
      Parameters:
      clientID - of type int - the client ID.
      nickname - of type String - the player's nickname.
      socketClientConnection - of type SocketClientConnection - the class linking client to server via socket.
      gameHandler - of type GameHandler - GameHandler reference.

  • Method Details

    • send

      public void send(Answer serverAnswer)
      Method send prepares the answer for sending it through the network, putting it in a serialized package, called SerializedMessage, then sends the packaged answer to the transmission protocol, located in the socket-client handler.
      Parameters:
      serverAnswer - of type Answer - the answer to be sent to the user.
      See Also:
      • for more details.

    • sendAll

      public void sendAll(Answer serverAnswer)
      Method sendAll sends the message to all playing clients, thanks to the GameHandler sendAll method. It's triggered from the model's listeners after a player action.
      Parameters:
      serverAnswer - of type Answer - the message to be sent.

    • getConnection

      public SocketClientConnection getConnection()
      Method getConnection returns the VirtualClient's SocketClientConnection instance.

      public String getNickname()
      Method getNickname returns the VirtualClient's client nickname.

    • getClientID

      public int getClientID()
      Method getNickname returns the VirtualClient's client ID.

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Method isConnected checks if a client is connected at the moment.
      Returns:
      true if the client is connected at the moment, false otherwise.

    • setSocketClientConnection

      public void setSocketClientConnection(SocketClientConnection connection)
      Method setSocketClientConnection sets a SocketClientConnection to the VirtualClient instance.
